amendment.description: At the end of the bill, before the short title, insert the following: ? SEC. __. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to fund the Hydroponic Tomato Production, Ohio grant.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds in the bill for the Hydroponic Tomato Production, Ohio grant.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A040) Failed by recorded vote: 90 - 328 (Roll no. 191).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A040) offered by Mr. Flake.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
